name: Yu Wang 0003
content: Yu Wang Yu Wang Professor and Chair, FIEEE, DMACM Wireless and Advanced Networking Group (WANG Lab) and Center for Networked Computing Department of Computer and Information Sciences Temple University Science Education and Research Center (SERC) 304A 1925 N. 12th Street Philadelphia, Pennsylvania 19122, USA +1-215-204-4187 (office) wangyu at temple dot edu Office Hour: 2-3pm on Monday/Wednesday or by email appointment Brief CV / Short Bio / Academic Ancestors "There is nothing more practical than a good theory" - Kurt Lewin (1952) News 2025-8-1 Congratulations to Bivor for starting as an Assistant Professor in the Department of Computer & Information Sciences at Towson University! 2024-12-5 Congratulations to Jiyao for winning the 2024 Award for Outstanding Research by a Graduate Student of the College of Science and Technology! 2024-6-17 Our VANET routing survey (2007) won the IEEE Vehicular Technology Society Best Magazine Paper Award! 2024-4-1 Congratulations to Jiyao for for winning the CIS Outstanding Graduate Research Assistant Award! 2023-8-1 Congratulations to Xinliang for starting as an assistant professor at Shenzhen Institute of Advanced Technology, Chinese Academy of Sciences, China! 2023-8-1 Congratulations to Jiyao for accepting an internship offer from the Toyato Info Tech Labs! 2023-4-20 Congratulations to Xinliang for successfully defensing his dissertation and winning the Scott Hibbs Future of Computing Award this year! Research My research is broadly related to networking, sensing and computing. Research Interests: Wireless Networks, Smart Sensing, Distributed Computing, Security and Privacy Publications: check Google Scholar Profile and DBLP Current Students: Jiyao Liu, Ph.D. Student Xuanzhang Liu, Ph.D. Student Graduated PhD Students: Cheng Bo, now at Google. Siyuan Chen, now at California DOJ. Minsu Huang, now at Uber. Fan Li, now Full Professor at Beijing Institute of Technology. Hanshang Li, now at Meta. Ting Li, now Assistant Professor at Oxford College of Emory University. A B M Mohaimenur (Bivor) Rahman, now Assistant Professor at Towson University Xinliang (Bruce) Wei, now Assistant Professor at Shenzhen Institutes of Advanced Technology, Chinese Academy of Sciences, China Ying Zhu, now at Google.
